issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second 'what is this' comprehension without concrete visual anchor
issues.rationale: Operating system metaphor needs visual translation or visitors bounce before understanding value

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates conversion dead zones during long-form scanning
issues.rationale: Users scrolling past pricing have no persistent action path, losing 30%+ mobile conversions

issues.description: Trust proof density too low for 'hand it off' promise requiring high confidence
issues.rationale: Delegation anxiety needs constant reinforcement through visible audit trails and control panels

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking buries value prop below fold on smaller screens
issues.rationale: If headline + subhead + CTA stack vertically, mobile users see only headline before scrolling

issues.description: Pricing table lacks risk reversal messaging for hesitant small business owners
issues.rationale: No trial/guarantee/cancellation info creates last-mile friction at decision point

issues.description: Section order doesn't follow problem→solution→proof→action narrative
issues.rationale: Jumping to features before establishing pain creates cognitive disconnect and scroll abandonment

issues.description: Typography hierarchy unclear between H2 sections and feature lists
issues.rationale: Weak visual distinction makes scanning difficult, increasing cognitive load

issues.description: Card components lack consistent visual grouping for feature comparison
issues.rationale: Inconsistent padding/borders make suite features hard to parse as unified system

issues.description: Mobile tap targets below 48px minimum for CTAs and navigation
issues.rationale: Small touch targets increase mis-taps and frustration on mobile devices

issues.description: Proof bar placement at footer instead of above-fold misses trust-building opportunity
issues.rationale: Social proof hidden below fold can't combat initial skepticism during hero scan

suggestedFixes.fix: Add dashboard mockup or control panel visual showing real-time business metrics within hero at 60% width
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete visual of 'operating system' concept creates instant comprehension and premium feel

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar on mobile (64px height) and floating side CTA on desktop after 30% scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent conversion path reduces decision paralysis and captures impulse conversions

suggestedFixes.fix: Insert mini audit log component showing '3 tasks completed' ticker every 2 sections (200px height)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Repeated visibility proof reinforces control promise throughout scroll journey

suggestedFixes.fix: Use horizontal logo/badge strip (scrollable) instead of vertical stack, keeping CTA above fold at 568px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Compressed hero ensures value prop + action visible without scrolling on iPhone SE

suggestedFixes.fix: Add '14-day free trial, cancel anytime' badge (green, 40px height) directly above pricing tiers
suggestedFixes.rationale: Risk reversal messaging at decision point removes final hesitation barrier

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder to: Hero → Problem (chaos) → Solution (OS) → Proof → Features → Pricing → CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Story arc builds emotional investment before presenting features and price

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase H2 to 32px desktop/24px mobile with 600 weight, add 80px top margin for clear breaks
suggestedFixes.rationale: Stronger hierarchy reduces cognitive load and improves 10-second scannability

suggestedFixes.fix: Standardize all cards to 16px padding, 8px radius, 1px border with consistent shadow depth
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual consistency helps users parse suite as cohesive system not random tools

suggestedFixes.fix: Set minimum 48px height for all interactive elements, 56px for primary CTAs on mobile
suggestedFixes.rationale: Larger targets reduce mis-taps by 40% improving mobile conversion flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Position proof bar (logos or metrics) directly below hero headline as 80px strip before subhead
suggestedFixes.rationale: Early trust signals combat skepticism during critical first-impression window

assumptions: Missing upstream designer outputs — critiquing homepage structure directly
Hero requires visual dashboard representation for OS metaphor clarity
Small business owners have high trust requirements for delegation tools
